title: 'Value for money'
body: '"I am delighted with my new sofa! The quality of the materials used is exceptional
column5: and it\'s incredibly comfortable. It\'s become the centerpiece of our living room
column6: and we\'ve received numerous compliments on its design. The purchase and delivery process were seamless
column7: making this a fantastic overall experience. I highly recommend this sofa to anyone in search of both style and comfort!"'

title: 'Comfortable sofa'
body: 'Comfortable sofa with good quality of posis work. Build quality is also good. Will suggest this as it is value for money'

title: 'value for money'
body: 'it is a value-for-money sofa and the fabric used is of good quality. plus the sturdiness of the sofa looks nice.'

title: 'Sturdy but doubtful on wood quality'
body: 'we placed an order for 2 of these and received the order on 17th Oct 2022
column5: and today as on 8th November it got a termite hole in it which keeps releasing the wood dust on one of the piece.'
